law.catch_line: Administrative regulations to implement Federal Drug-Free Workplace Act.
law.text: The secretary of the Personnel Cabinet shall promulgate administrative regulations in accordance with KRS Chapter 13A, to implement the provisions of the Federal Drug-Free Workplace Act of 1988, Subtitle D of Public Law 100-690, so that the Commonwealth of Kentucky can certify that it has met the requirements designed to promote a drug-free workplace for all state employees.
law.history: Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 154, sec. 17, effective July 15, 1998. -- Created 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 483, sec. 7, effective July 13, 1990.

metadata.budget-ref: See State/Executive Branch Budget, 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 117, Pt. I, C, 2, (2) at 628. See State/Executive Branch Budget, 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 117, Pt. I, D, 10, (1) at 636.
